short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Type kana alphabets without japanese keyboard.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a tool who uses english keyboard but wants to type with kana alphabets. You dont need another keyboard anymore. Just press Alt Graph to change between alphabets.
